backend/main.mo: Defines core types and logic for users, invoices, energy readings, and access control with role validation and profile queries.
backend/migration.mo: Adds migration logic to extend old actor state by introducing an empty energyReadings list.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to their related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata and loads the main React TypeScript application.
frontend/README.md: Provides frontend architecture overview including authentication, authorization, state management, and styling conventions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application file configuring routes, providers, and layout including LiveTelemetry and authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Placeholder file with no content for an access-denied screen component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthCornerC: Provides UI controls for login, signup, and user menu using dropdowns and modals based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthModal.t: Modal with login and signup tabs handling authentication and navigation on success.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginForm.t: Login form with validation, password toggle, and submit handling with loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wrapper that redirects unauthenticated users and renders children only when logged in.
Signup form with input validation and submission logic including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/energy/AnimatedN: Animated number component easing values over time with configurable duration and formatting.
frontend/src/components/energy/charts/Co: Bar chart visualizing daily and monthly appliance energy consumption.
frontend/src/components/energy/charts/So: Bar chart showing solar, grid, and excess energy allocation values.
Pie chart comparing solar energy usage versus grid usage.
frontend/src/components/energy/EmptyStat: Displays an empty state card with message and optional navigation button.
frontend/src/components/energy/ErrorStat: Error card showing a message with optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/energy/LastUpdat: Shows relative last-updated time and flags stale data based on connection status.
frontend/src/components/energy/LiveStatu: Badge indicating live, connecting, or disconnected telemetry status.
frontend/src/components/energy/LoadingSt: Loading card with spinner and optional message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with topbar, sidebar (desktop and mobile), main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Renders sidebar navigation with route-aware active states and navigation handlers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Topbar.ts: Displays the app header with branding, mobile menu toggle, user info, and logout action.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling configuration for real-time energy data including intervals, backoff, throttling, and logging.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Manages auth state with token persistence, auto-logout on expiry, and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/context/LiveTelemetryContex: Provides live telemetry state, handling real-time readings, rolling averages, freshness tracking, and connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Convenience hook to access the AuthContext.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth flow, exposing identity state and login/clear actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom green-energy theme variables and base/global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/auth/HomeAuthPage.tsx: Public landing page displaying hero content, feature highlights, and illustration for the energy optimizer app with an auth control corner.
frontend/src/pages/buyer/BuyerDashboardP: Empty placeholder file for the buyer dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/energy/ConsumptionPag: Fetches and displays consumption analytics with live telemetry updates, including charts, metrics, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/energy/CostEstimation: Loads and presents cost estimation metrics with real‑time telemetry adjustments and standard loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/energy/InputsPage.tsx: Form for entering appliances and solar system inputs, supporting dynamic fields and submitting data to the energy API.
frontend/src/pages/energy/OverviewPage.t: Dashboard overview showing high‑level energy metrics and prompting users to submit inputs before analysis.
frontend/src/pages/energy/SolarAnalysisP: React page that loads solar analysis data, integrates live telemetry, and displays metrics with charts and status components.
frontend/src/pages/gst/GstReturnsPage.ts: Empty placeholder page file for GST returns.
frontend/src/pages/inventory/InventoryPa: Empty placeholder page file for inventory management.
frontend/src/pages/inventory/LowStockAle: Empty placeholder page file for low stock alerts.
frontend/src/pages/invoices/InvoiceCreat: Empty placeholder page file for creating or editing invoices.
frontend/src/pages/invoices/InvoiceDetai: Empty placeholder page file for viewing invoice details.
frontend/src/pages/invoices/InvoiceListP: Empty placeholder page file for listing invoices.
frontend/src/pages/seller/SellerDashboar: Empty placeholder page file for the seller dashboard.
frontend/src/services/apiClient.ts: Utility wrapper around fetch providing JSON requests, auth token handling, and basic error propagation.
frontend/src/services/authApi.ts: Implements login and registration API calls with structured error handling for authentication endpoints.
frontend/src/services/energyApi.ts: API client for submitting energy inputs and fetching consumption, solar analysis, and cost estimation with validation and auth.
frontend/src/services/energyTypes.ts: Type definitions and type guards for energy input, consumption, solar analysis, and cost estimation models.
frontend/src/services/liveReadingsApi.ts: API wrapper around backend actor for real-time energy readings with categorized error handling and logging.
frontend/src/services/realTimeEnergyServ: Polling-based real-time energy service managing subscribers, connection status, throttling, and backoff retries.
frontend/src/state/EnergyFlowContext.tsx: React context managing submitted energy inputs and exposing setters for input workflow state.
frontend/src/types/liveTelemetry.ts: Type definitions for live telemetry readings, connection status, rolling averages, and freshness tracking.
frontend/src/utils/jwt.ts: JWT utility functions for decoding tokens, checking expiration, and retrieving expiration time.
frontend/src/utils/realtimeLogging.ts: Implements a configurable real-time logger with level filtering, context sanitization, and helper methods for connection lifecycle events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session-based parameters, including support for hash routing.
frontend/standalone-gst-demo/index.html: Standalone HTML app defining the GST demo UI structure with login, dashboard, invoice, and GST return views.
frontend/standalone-gst-demo/script.js: Vanilla JS powering authentication, navigation, invoice management, GST filing, and fallback API behavior for the standalone demo.
frontend/standalone-gst-demo/style.css: Pure CSS stylesheet providing a responsive finance-themed UI with layout, components, and utility styles for the GST demo.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, components, plugins, and design tokens for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for adding real-time energy data ingestion, processing, storage, and streaming with WebSockets/SSE, plus frontend real-time services and UI updates. Lists architectural notes and existing frontend feature specs.
